Package com.hci.geotagger.activities

Class Summary
AddTagActivity Addtag activity allows the user to add new tags to the database.
AdvEditPeopleTabActivity Taglist activity displays a scrollable list of tags for a given user account and gives the user the ability to click on them to view the tag.
AdvEditTagTabActivity Taglist activity displays a scrollable list of tags for a given user account and gives the user the ability to click on them to view the tag.
AdventureListActivity Adventurelist activity displays a scrollable list of adventures for a given user account and gives the user the ability to click on them to view the adventure.
AdventureViewActivity This class should be re-written since TabActivity is deprecated.
AdvViewPeopleTabActivity Taglist activity displays a scrollable list of tags for a given user account and gives the user the ability to click on them to view the tag.
AdvViewTagTabActivity Taglist activity displays a scrollable list of tags for a given user account and gives the user the ability to click on them to view the tag.
CommentViewActivity This class implements the extended view of the comments and allows the user to click on a comment in the TagViewActivity and bring up this activity.
EditAdventureActivity This class currently is not being used in this iteration of GeoTagger.
EditProfileActivity This class allows a user to modify their Profile information.
FriendListActivity This class is not used in current iteration of GeoTagger.
HomeActivity This class inherits SherlockActivity and brings the user to the home screen.
LoginActivity This is the first activity the user comes in contact with.
MapViewActivity This class shows a Map view.
RegisterActivity This class handles new user registration, using business rules concerning password and username format regarding legnth and characters used.
TagListActivity Taglist activity displays a scrollable list of tags for a given user account and gives the user the ability to click on them to view the tag.
TagViewActivity This class allows user to view all information associated with a given tag.
TagViewActivity_Phone Class only temporarily used for tablet/phone compatiblity during new ui integration.
UserProfileActivity This class takes a user to either the EditProfile activity or view tag activity.
